trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Mankato
There was one other sighting in Mankato on or around March 19th 2011
Summary: *YouTube link moved to Additional Evidence Section--CMS/sg.
divs: sighting detailsjust a typical few minutes of filming in mankato. the sky is literally crawling with these things. whats all the fuss about? it's been this way for a long time, but people are pretty hush hush and or unawares. very common aerial activity here in mankato. these things are out in broad daylight also constantly. no one cares to look up i guess. the daylight ones are the most shocking, in my opinion. they can be seen by anyone who figures out the program going on here. deep. 2 miles\near mankato 7pm approx. 1st noticed because i went to see them here feelings: same old same old. lose sight: i just stopped filming and went home contact info included *youtube link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg.
